name: Jumpin in Catland - Action Mod
description:
PLAYER 1:

Use A and D keys to move

Use W to shoot mice

PLAYER 2:

Use left and right arrows to move

Use up arrow to shoot mice

GOAL:

Gain the most points by continue jumping on the clouds and not falling, hitting your opponent with a mouse, or jumping on your opponent. Be careful not to fall, get shot, or get stomped on or else you will lose points as well!
